topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559321dc63687218570010dd#post_559321dc63687218570010dd
To be fair often times I see people going "man I can't wait for this new technology cause then we'll have real life superheroes!"

Sure stuff like invisibility is possible, but you'll get shot.

Sure stuff like regeneration is possible, but again you'll get shot.

Sure stuff like completely metal skeleton is possible, but again you'll get shot.

Sure stuff like power armor iron man armor is possible, but you'll get tazed in the head and 1000 volts rolling around in your brain.

If anything Especially the Hulk and Superman.

the Hulk literally is Gama Radiation.

And Superman is. Well, Superman. He can breath in space and gets powered by the sun.

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559323486368721857001302#post_559323486368721857001302
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559322926368720b66000665#post_559322926368720b66000665
How you will gonna get shot if no one can see you?

How you will gonna die of a shot if the wounds will heal?

How you will gonna die of a shot if the bullet can't penetratre the metal?

How you will gonna get tazed if the power armor is anti-static and the helmet have a rubber-like material anti-electricity?[/bq]
Thermal goggles; just cause you're invisible doesn't mean you're not giving off heat.

Shoot them in the head; shut off their body long enough that it would effectively lobotomize them. . aka why wolverine lost his memories.

Metal skeleton =/= metal skin; if they had metal skin then just electrocute them.

There are non-conductive metals, but they're absolute dog shit for protection against bullets.
